special_abilities.name: Fey Ancestry.
descriptions: The drider has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put the drider to sleep.

special_abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting.
descriptions: The drider's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 13). The drider can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:

special_abilities.name: Spider Climb.
descriptions: The drider can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.

special_abilities.name: Sunlight Sensitivity.
descriptions: While in sunlight, the drider has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

special_abilities.name: Web Walker.
descriptions: The drider ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

special_abilities.name: Spellcasting.
descriptions: The drider is a 7th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save DC 14, +6 to hit with spell attacks). The drider has the following spells prepared from the cleric spell list:
* 1st level (4 slots): bane, detect magic, sanctuary

actions.name: Multiattack.
descriptions: The drider makes three attacks, either with its longsword or its longbow. It can replace one of those attacks with a bite attack.

actions.name: Bite.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 2 (1d4) piercing damage plus 9 (2d8) poison damage.

actions.name: Longsword.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) slashing damage, or 8 (1d10 + 3) slashing damage if used with two hands.

actions.name: Longbow.
descriptions: Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, range 150/600 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage plus 4 (1d8) poison damage.
